term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - recoil-free fraction in Mössbauer spectrometry
term.title: recoil-free fraction

item.text: The fraction of all Mössbauer gamma rays of the transition which are emitted or absorbed without significant recoil energy loss.

sources.item: PAC, 1976, 45, 211. 'Nomenclature and Conventions for Reporting Mössbauer Spectroscopic Data' on page 214 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197645030211)
